title: Timeless Serenity: Elegant Duplex Retreat in Krosno Old Town
description: Nestled in the historic heart of Krosno's Old Town, this beautifully appointed duplex offers 4 serene bedrooms and 2 refined bathrooms across a spacious 156 sqm. Experience tranquility and modern living with soundproofed walls, letting every moment be one of calm. The luminous interiors are bathed in contemporary lighting, and a dedicated storage room ensures all your treasures have a place.
neighborhood_description: Old Town, Krosno, combines the charm of cobbled streets with the convenience of local shopping and cozy dining just steps away. The neighborhood radiates friendly energy, a haven for those seeking both cultural engagement and peace. Its safe, close-knit community is perfect for leisurely strolls to coffee shops or artisan markets.
lifestyle_benefits: ample space for visiting family and hobbies
target_buyer: Ideally suited for retirees seeking comfort, community, and security, this residence is perfect for those wishing to savor their days amidst history without sacrificing swift access to urban conveniences.
market_positioning: Seldom do homes in so charming and established a location come to market offering such modern resilience and expressive comforts; this property blends tradition and innovation, representing outstanding value for discerning retirees in Krosno.
